Container.Name: ModemReboot
Container.Overview: Puppeteer container for rebooting Modems on a schedule The specific navigation for your modem will vary, This is more of an example and isn't guaranteed to work for your particular modem. Feel free to make a PR or add an issue here https://github.com/agusalex/modemReboot/issues to add your own modem's script If no CRON Env var is passed it will reboot upon first run and then quit
